product_name: Pearl Izumi Select Limited Edition Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: High-quality moisture-managing fabric, semi-formfitting, and fresh, original Pearl Izumi graphics are the signature of the Select Limited Edition Bike Jersey for men. Polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries fast, offers excellent UPF 40 sun protection from harmful UV rays and features limited edition graphics. Elasticized hem is dropped in back for full coverage in the saddle. Front 12 in. zipper allows venting. Pearl Izumi Select Limited Edition Bike Jersey for men features 3 back pockets. Closeout.
short_description: High-quality moisture-managing fabric, semi-formfitting, and fresh, original Pearl Izumi graphics are the signature of the Select Limited Edition Bike Jersey for men.
